name: Baikal
description: Baikal is a lightweight CalDAV+CardDAV server. It offers an extensive web interface with easy management of users, address books and calendars. Based on sabre/dav, it supports CalDAV (RFC 4791) for calendars and CardDAV (RFC 6352) for contacts, with a clean admin interface.
author: sabre.io

form_fields.label: Server Name
form_fields.hint: The server name for Apache (e.g., dav.example.com). Leave default for local use.
